message.name: LM_TASK_THUMBBARUPDATEBUTTONS
message.description: LiteStep sends this message when an application has called ITaskbarList::ThumbBarUpdateButtons

parameter.name: wParam
parameter.description: A handle to the window that buttons are being added to.

parameter.name: lParam
parameter.description: The buttons that are being updated.

remarks.p: To receive this message, modules need to register for it by using LM_REGISTERMESSAGE.
